original_text: Wherefore then didst thou not obey the voice of the Lord, but didst fly upon the spoil, and didst evil in the sight of the Lord?
korean_text: 어찌하여 왕이 여호와의 목소리를 청종하지 아니하고 탈취하기에만 급하여 여호와께서 악하게 여기시는 일을 행하였나이까

sentences.original_text: Wherefore then didst thou not obey
but didst fly upon the spoil
and didst evil in the sight of the Lord?
